series.title: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
series.author: Karen Kilgariff, Georgia Hardstark, Feral Audio

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 20
episodes.summary: We're not here to talk about microphones, we're here to talk about your hometown murders! On this week's My Favorite Murder minisode, Karen and Georgia continue the tour theme and read your hometown murders from Boston and New York City.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 58 - Some Quiet Sunday
episodes.summary: What a huge goddamn relief, it's a new My Favorite Murder! This week Karen and Georgia talk about the folie à deux of the Eriksson twins and the crimes of Mel Ignatow. Plus a hometown murder from comedian Kurt Braunohler.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 57 - Live At The Fox Theater
episodes.summary: Live at the Fox Theater, Karen and Georgia kick off the My Favorite Murder Spring Tour (official title still pending). Onstage in Oakland, they talk about the Speed Freak Killers and the earthquake-fearing Herbert Mullin.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 19
episodes.summary: Oakland, Vancouver, and Seattle: it's your hometown murders on this week's My Favorite Murder minisode! Karen and Georgia retell an 'I Survived'-esque story, read a pot-smoker's near brush with a killer, and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 56- Service Poodle
episodes.summary: There's no time to sing a goddamn song, but there is time for My Favorite Murder! This week Karen and Georgia unpack the Darlie Routier case and the true story behind Hollywood star Fatty Arbuckle.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 18
episodes.summary: This week's My Favorite Murder minisode was found under the sink, next to a collection of creepy poems. Hear Karen and Georgia read your hometown murder stories including the Donald Duck Killer, the Meat Cleaver Murderer, and more!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 55 - Let's Hear Your Podcast
episodes.summary: Full of twists and turns, it's a new My Favorite Murder! This week Karen and Georgia get real deep into the story of french maids, Christine and Léa Papin and the "carnival atmosphere" surrounding Dr. Sam Sheppard and the murder of his wife, Marilyn Reese Sheppard.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 17
episodes.summary: Jazz hands up, it's a new My Favorite Murder minisode! Karen and Georgia read your hometown murders from all over the world including Austria, Ireland, El Paso Texas, and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 54 - Valet Area
episodes.summary: Let Karen and Georgia be your weekly valet to My Favorite Murder. On this episode they cover the terrible deeds of Nathaniel Bar-Jonah and Rodney Alcala.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 53 - Live at The Orpheum
episodes.summary: Wake up dads, it's My Favorite Murder live from The Orpheum theater in Los Angeles! On stage, Karen and Georgia tell the sordid tales of the LA Ripper and the Greystone Mansion Murders. Then, Dave Anthony and Gareth Reynolds from The Dollop stop by to tell their 'hometown' stories.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 16
episodes.summary: My Favorite Murder Minisodes turn 16! To celebrate, Karen and Georgia read two New Zealand hometown murders, the dirty secret behind Kip's Tacos, and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 52 - Bonjour, Internet!
episodes.summary: Always in fashion and never full price, it's My Favorite Murder! This week Karen and Georgia tackle internet murderer Luka Magnotta and the unsolved case that lead to the creation of the AMBER Alert.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 15
episodes.summary: It's not fake, it's a My Favorite Murder minisode! Karen and Georgia recount hometown tales including Sonoma's Ramon Salcido, Mexican wrestler La Dama del Silencio, The Catman Of Greenock, and more!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 51 - A Bit of Oblivion
episodes.summary: Ring those bells it's the latest My Favorite Murder. This week Karen and Georgia recount the harrowing survival story of Jennifer Holliday and the tragic case behind the creation of Megan's Law.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 14
episodes.summary: Dial 1-800-KILL-KILL-KILL it's a My Favorite Murder minisode! This week, Karen and Georgia kick off 2017 with your hometown stories about nextdoor murderers, young 'Bonnie & Clyde' types, twisted morticians, and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 50 - The Golden Anniversary Episode
episodes.summary: Rock, paper, scissors... it's My Favorite Murder! On this episode, Karen and Georgia delve into the mystery of the Somerton Man and discuss the 1984 bioterror attack by followers of the Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 49 - The Great Guy Law-Time New Years Spectacular
episodes.summary: On this year-end legal extravaganza, Karen and Georgia talk to comedian and actual law school graduate Guy Branum about what makes murder murder. Plus more True Crime trading cards!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 48 - An Albert Fish Production
episodes.summary: On this week's My Favorite Murder (now with a stick of shitty gum!), Karen and Georgia recount the Starved Rock State Park murders and the mysterious ongoing kidnapping case of Sherri Papini.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 13
episodes.summary: On this week's My Favorite Murder minisode, Karen and Georgia read hometown stories from sister murderinos and give real estate advice on buying killer condos!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 47 - Live at The Bell House
episodes.summary: On a live episode of My Favorite Murder in Brooklyn, Karen and Georgia tell the stories of New York's Torso Killer and the murder of Imette St. Guillen. Plus guest Jamie Lee shares the murder of Dee Dee Blanchard and the boys from Last Podcast On The Left tell their hometown murders.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 46 - Skippers Unite!
episodes.summary: In a no nonsense episode of My Favorite Murder, Karen and Georgia discuss the serial killer Leslie Allen Williams and the enigmatic Israel Keyes.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 12
episodes.summary: On this week’s selection of hometown murders, Karen and Georgia read a tale by a 13 year-old, share a listener’s Ted Bundy connection, and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 45- Funky Diva
episodes.summary: In a traumatic night of unbelievable circumstance, this week’s My Favorite Murder features the story of Lord Lucan and the mystery of the Summerhill Road Murders.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 44 - Live from the Chicago Podcast Festival
episodes.summary: Karen and Georgia are live at the Chicago Podcast Festival talking about the Fort Worth Three kidnapping and Chicago’s very own John Wayne Gacy.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 11
episodes.summary: This week’s minisode features more hometown murders read to you by Karen and Georgia including tales of lust, drugs, murder, Iceland, and more!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 43 - In Arrears
episodes.summary: This week on My Favorite Murder, Karen and Georgia talk with their mouths about a tragic murder/suicide at the International Dunes Hotel and the still-unsolved Chicago Tylenol poisonings.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 42 - Abject Failure
episodes.summary: This week on My Favorite Murder, Karen and Georgia are here for you with a collection of hometown murders including the ever-evolving tale of Todd Kohlhepp and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 41 - Live from EW Popfest
episodes.summary: This week was recorded live from the Entertainment Weekly Popfest 2016. Karen and Georgia share Hollywood tales of murder including Lana Turner's dark family secrets and the Wasp Woman, Susan Cabot. Plus a hometown murder picked right from the studio audience!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 10
episodes.summary: In this civically responsible My Favorite Murder minisode, Karen and Georgia read your hometown murders including a family murder in New Mexico, a spooky sleepover tale, and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 40 - Squad Gourds
episodes.summary: My Favorite Murder is the perfect coffee table podcast for you. This week Karen and Georgia unpack the "My Way" killings in the Philippines and the terrible murder of Scott Amedure.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 9
episodes.summary: On this week’s My Favorite Murder minisode, Karen and Georgia read your hometown murder stories including serial killer Henry Lee Lucas, murderer Mark Winger, and a two-parter involving a feigned love of camping, a dead body, and a couch covered in blood!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 39 - Kind of Loco
episodes.summary: This week on My Favorite Murder, Karen and Georgia have their protective eyewear on to talk about Charles Albright, the Texas Eyeball Killer. Then they tackle the notorious and tall Co-ed Killer, Ed Kemper.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 38 - Sidebar Nation
episodes.summary: It’s My Favorite Murder, this week with hand-holding and shit! Karen and Georgia share the story of the killer priest, Gerald Robinson, and prepare for their trip to Chicago with a breakdown of the 2016 Gage Park stabbings.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 8
episodes.summary: Karen and Georgia read a selection of your hometown murder emails and dole out a small serving of true crime to get you through your week.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 37 - Liminal Space
episodes.summary: This week on My Favorite Murder, Karen and Georgia discuss the murder of Peru's Ruth Thalia Sayas after her appearance on a game show, as well as the murderous reign of sweet little old lady Dorothea Puente in Sacramento, CA.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 36 - Live from LA Podcast Festival
episodes.summary: This week, it's the first ever live My Favorite Murder broadcast from the LA Podcast Festival. Karen, Georgia and comedian/The Dollop co-host Dave Anthony talk about the Trailside Killer, the Wineville Chicken Coop Murders and Australian murderer Mark Erinn Rust.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 7
episodes.summary: Hey! Didn’t see you there. It’s a My Favorite Murder minisode. This week Karen and Georgia read your hometown murders that include the spooky 'Bermuda Triangle Of Murder’ in the Wisconsin town of Kenosha, House Hunters: Quadruple Homicide Edition, a prep school Slender Man murder, and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 35 - A Small Foreign Faction
episodes.summary: This week on My Favorite Murder, Karen and Georgia reflect and ruminate on the circus surrounding the life and death of JonBenét Ramsey. Pop culture gone mad.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 34 - Thirty Let The Bodies Hit The Four
episodes.summary: It’s a Sciatica Special on this week’s My Favorite Murder. Karen and Georgia delve deep into the twisted life of Richard Speck and the equally terrifying mind of Martin Bryant with the Port Arthur Massacre.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 6
episodes.summary: Yikes! It’s a My Favorite Murder minisode! Karen and Georgia read your hometown murder stories including the the Texarkana Moonlight Murders and the Sasebo Slashing.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 33 - What About Mimi?
episodes.summary: This week, Karen and Georgia talk the increasingly surreal Jane Mixer case along with the Co-ed Killer and then recount the incredible survival of Jennifer Morey. Come have tea with us, Rosemary & Thyme style on My Favorite Murder.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode #5
episodes.summary: You keep sending them, Karen and Georgia will keep reading them! This week’s hometown murder minisode includes a hexing witch beatdown, a shouting match with a serial killer, unfortunate back rubs, a recent unsolved river murder mystery, and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 32 - Just The 32 Of Us
episodes.summary: This week on My Favorite Murder, Karen and Georgia talk the life and death of pop singer Selena and then give the lowdown on the Zankou Chicken Murders.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode #4
episodes.summary: Karen and Georgia read your hometown murder stories that include a poisoned milkshake, a field full of wheat and blood, a ‘cliche reckless teenager,’ and a slumber party gone wrong. Does Elvis get a cookie this time? Tune in to find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 31 - Namaste Sexy
episodes.summary: This week, Karen and Georgia dive deep into the world of Lululemon with the Yoga Store Murder and then tell the tale of Tent Girl and The Doe Network. Plus a hometown murder by comedian Guy Branum!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 3
episodes.summary: In this special minisode, Karen and Georgia read your hometown murder stories that include a prophetic child, a heroic dog, the Easter Sunday Massacre, and more. They're all succinct and horrifying!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 30 - The F*ck Word Murder Mystery Show
episodes.summary: This week, Karen and Georgia discuss serial killer Cary Stayner and the Yosemite murders as well as con man/murderer Clark Rockefeller (aka Christian Gerhartsreiter aka Chris Crowe aka Chris Chichester.)

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 29 - Episode: Twenty-Nein
episodes.summary: Karen and Georgia discuss family-annihilator John List, as well as Warriena Tagpuno Wright who fell 14 floors to her death. Plus a hometown murder by comedian Matt McCarthy.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 28 - I 28 His Liver With Some Fava Beans and A Nice Chianti
episodes.summary: This week Karen and Georgia share stories that are new to the other: the Durham Family Murders and the amazing story of Terry Jo Duperrault.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 27 - Your Hometown Murder Email Round-Up
episodes.summary: In a very special episode, Karen & Georgia share just a few of the hundreds of listener hometown murders that have been sent to us.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 26 - Twenty Six Six Six
episodes.summary: Karen and Georgia freak out over presents from listeners, then get dark with two child murders: Mary Bell and Lisa Steinberg.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 25 - Twenty Knives
episodes.summary: New favorite TV show talk followed by the Christopher Dorner killing spree and the tragic Cheshire Murders. Plus Georgia is bested by a hometown murder.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 24 - Episode ...And Twenty Justice Four All
episodes.summary: This week K&G discuss Karen's tragic hometown murder, Polly Klaas, as well as the truth behind Kitty Genovese's stabbing. Plus must-watch documentaries and all the banter you can handle.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 23 - Making A Twenty-Thirderer
episodes.summary:
Karen & Georgia focus on their favorite survivor murder stories, featuring an escape from The Chessboard Killer, and the harrowing story of a pregnant woman fighting for her life. Plus a rad listener hometown murder and tons of banter.

This episode is brought to you by Fullscreen! Get your free one-month trial today at fullscreen.com/murder!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 22 - The Girls with the Episode Twenty Two
episodes.summary:
This week Karen and Georgia give themselves the impossible task of making murders from the 1500s interesting. The Sawny Bean legend and the Princes in the Tower are the murders of choice, along with a listener hometown murder and a discussion of the new Simpsons documentary. Enjoy, Murderinos!

This episode is brought to you by Fullscreen--get a free one-month trail at: fullscreen.com/murder!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 21 - Because 7 8 9
episodes.summary:
This week the ladies go way off topic before launching into their favorite murders, which focuses on the Cleveland Elementary School shootings (aka "I don't like Mondays") and 1800s nurse/serial killer Jane Toppan. Please remember to stay sexy and don't get murdered! 

This episode is brought to you by Fullscreen--get a free one-month trail at: fullscreen.com/murder!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.summary:
This week Karen & Georgia discuss the rape trial of Brock Turner before delving into The Night Stalker's victims and capture, and New Zealand's infamous Bain Family Murders. 
​

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 19 -  Nineteen Kills And Counting
episodes.summary: This week Karen and Georgia focus on the depravity of the human race by discussing Norwegian sh*t head Anders Behring Breivik and the unsolved horror that is the "Freeway Phantom." Grab your anti-depressants and come along on a roller coaster ride of murder!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 18 - Investigateighteen Discovery
episodes.summary: Karen and Georgia's favorite murders this week are creepazoids Lawrence Singleton and Franklin Delano Floyd, and boy, do they fucking suck. Plus lots of small (murder) talk and personal stories plus all the staying sexy and not getting murdered you've come to know and love. Enjoy, murderionos!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 2
episodes.summary: In minisodes Karen & Georgia read the hometown murders that listeners email in (myfavoritemurder@gmail.com) and play recordings of hometown murders from friends. Loads of murderey fun!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 17 - Episode SE7ENteen
episodes.summary: This week's favorite murders include the killing of 13 year old Jennifer Moore in Novato, CA, and the murder-suicide of pro-wrestler Chris Benoit and his family. Plus tons of personal stories, shit talking, staying sexy, and not getting murdered.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 16 - Blood Murder Sixteen Magik
episodes.summary: The ladies discuss their new crime show obsession, The Family, along with the murder of Chandra Levy and the sad story of Sylvia Likens. Plus a hometown murder from comedian Kara Klenk.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 15 - Definitely Not Episode 16
episodes.summary: The theme this week is "murders from the year 2000," with Harold Shipman and the Setagay Family Murders taking the stage.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 14 - You Sexy Motherfourteen
episodes.summary: Karen and Georgia tackle their favorite 1990s murders, featuring serial killer Joseph Naso and the death of Sherrice Iverson in Nevada.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 13 - Thirteen Going On Murdy
episodes.summary: This week Karen and Georgia tell each other their favorite murders from the 1980s, featuring The Preppie Murder and the Keddie Murders. Plus your favorite murders and lots of stabby talk!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 12 - Our Bodies, Our Twelves
episodes.summary: Karen and Georgia get deep when they discuss the murder that started their obsession with true crime: a kid on fire and a mom that assassinated her children. Happy listening!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 11 - What the Helleven
episodes.summary: The theme this week is "cannibals" and it gets gross when Karen discusses murder and mayhem on a Greyhound bus, and Georgia goes classic with everyone's favorite nasty old man, Albert Fish. Plus lots of shit talking and staying sexy, as always.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 10 - Murderous TENdencies
episodes.summary: This week's topic is "weird murders," featuring Who Put Bella In the Witch Elm and Richard Chase (The Vampire of Sacramento). Plus murder books and personal stories galore!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: MFM Minisode 1
episodes.summary: It's the first ever Murder Minisode! We read your hometown submissions and favorite murders on the topic of the week.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 9 - Color Me Nine
episodes.summary: The theme for this episode is "hiding in plain sight." Karen covers an Exorcist serial killer and Georgia talks about children who murder. Plus stories and favorites from listeners!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 8 - Eight Is Enough Murders
episodes.summary: This weeks topic is weird ways to die including cursed movies and the Coronado Mansion Death. Plus a ton of personal anecdotes from K&G and a hometown murder from Mr. Georia Hardstark, Vince Averill.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 7 - Seven Murders in Heaven
episodes.summary: This week the girls discuss their favorite unsolved murders, including The Black Dahlia and Elisa Lam. Plus a hometown murder story by Doug Loves Movie cohost Karen Anderson and listener's favorite murders!

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 6 - Stay Sixy
episodes.summary: For their first themed episode, Karen and Georgia discuss children who kill their parents, featuring Alex & Derek King and Jasmine Richardson. The ladies also discuss TV shows The People vs. OJ and Autopsy, and read listener hometown murders.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 5 - Five Favorite Murders
episodes.summary: In this episode we discuss LA Freeway Killers of the 70s, the Martha Moxley murder case and read more listener hometown murder stories.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 4 - Go Forth and Murder
episodes.summary: The girls touch on Making A Murderer theories before delving into child killer Cropsey and the murder of Michele Wallace. Plus listener hometown stories including Adam Walsh, the girl in the box, and the Petaluma Tickler.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 3 - Our Favorite Thirder
episodes.summary: In this episode, Georgia and Karen discuss the Cameron Todd Willingham arson case, the Oakland County child killings and comedian/We Watch Wrestling podcast co-host Tom Sibley shares his hometown upholstery murder story.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 2 - My Second Best Murder
episodes.summary: In this episode, Karen & Georgia discuss Paul Bernardo the Scarborough Rapist/Schoolgirl Killer, the assassination of Robert Kennedy and Alie Ward shares a hometown high school murder story.

episodes.seriesTitle: My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark
episodes.title: 1 - My Firstest Murder
episodes.summary: My Firstest Murder - in the very first episode, Karen & Georgia discuss car accidents, Jon Benet Ramsey, and the Sacramento's East Area rapist. Plus a local crime story from Feral Audio founder, Dustin Martian.
